mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FULFILLMENT(REGION, NAME, PLAN_NUM, COMPLETE_NUM, TRY_NUM, REGION_DEV, FULFILLMENT) VALUES (#{region}, #{name}, #{planNum}, #{completeNum}, #{tryNum}, #{regionDev})
mapper.select: SELECT REGION, NAME, PLAN_NUM, COMPLETE_NUM, TRY_NUM, REGION_DEV, FULFILLMENT FROM FULFILLMENT
SELECT REGION, NAME, PLAN_NUM, COMPLETE_NUM, TRY_NUM, REGION_DEV, FULFILLMENT FROM FULFILLMENT ORDER BY FULFILLMENT DESC LIMIT 5
